greeting: Hello, ${first_name}! Welcome to our bot! With this bot, you can place your order through our existing services. Select one of the following commands to use the bot:

language.title: Language selection
language.description: 🇺🇿 Bot tilini o'zgartirish uchun quyidagi buyruqlardan birini tanlang. 🇷🇺 Выберите одну из команд ниже, чтобы изменить язык бота. 🇬🇧 Choose one of the commands below to change the bot language. The current bot language is English.
language.changed: The bot language has been changed to English

cart.title: Cart
cart.empty: Your cart is empty. You haven't selected any products yet?!

unknown_command: Unknown command. Please select one of the following buttons.
